TextView.android:text: Our aim is to manage a fine balance between the traditional format of learning and the contemporary style of teaching. To create a space of learning that gives a sense of belonging to all who are associated with RCA Music Academy.As educators, we take great pride in our performance-based model of music instruction.This essentially means that our approach is different in more ways than one. As a vibrant, contemporary Academy, we have turned the music education methodology on its ear by following ‘fun while learning to play’ practice.
